525580.name: Spectrum Soundtrack
525580.description:
Original soundtrack of Spectrum. Composed by Dave Delgado. The OST contains all 19 tracks from the game, plus an unreleased track (Island Swings) in both MP3 and FLAC formats.

01 - Intro
02 - Ambient 8 Gabo
03 - Mechanical Shift
04 - Ambient 4 Klee
05 - Grand State
06 - Ambient 7 Feininger
07 - The Chase
08 - Ambient 3 Moholo-Nagy
09 - Ants
10 - Ambient 5 Kandinsky
11 - Eternal Sunrise
12 - Ambient 2 Gropius
13 - Delirium
14 - Ambient 9 Muche
15 - Cave Drips
16 - Ambient 1 Albers
17 - Beautiful Thoughts
18 - Ambient 6 Breuer
19 - Spectrum Finale
20 - Island Swings
